original_solution_mapping.L1: Out of the 150 students, 100% - 60% = 40% are boys.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Out of the 60 boys, 60 x 1/3 = <<60*1/3=20>>20 joined varsity clubs.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Therefore, 60 - 20 = <<60-20=40>>40 boys did not join varsity clubs.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3375.
    Returns: the number of boys who did not join varsity clubs.
    """
    # L1
    total_percentage = 100 # WK
    girls_percentage = 60 # 60% are girls
    boys_percentage = total_percentage - girls_percentage

    # L2
    total_students = 150 # 150 students
    num_boys = total_students * boys_percentage / total_percentage

    # L3
    fraction_joined_clubs = Fraction(1, 3) # 1/3 of the boys
    boys_joined_clubs = num_boys * fraction_joined_clubs

    # L4
    boys_not_joined_clubs = num_boys - boys_joined_clubs

    # FA
    answer = boys_not_joined_clubs
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Out of the 150 students, {total_percentage}% - {girls_percentage}% = {boys_percentage}% are boys.
Out of the {num_boys} boys, {num_boys} x {fraction_joined_clubs} = <<{num_boys}*{fraction_joined_clubs}={boys_joined_clubs}>>{boys_joined_clubs} joined varsity clubs.
Therefore, {num_boys} - {boys_joined_clubs} = <<{num_boys}-{boys_joined_clubs}={boys_not_joined_clubs}>>{boys_not_joined_clubs} boys did not join varsity clubs.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Out of the 150 students, 100% - 60% = 160% are boys.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Out of the 240 boys, 240 x 1/3 = <<240*1/3=80>>80 joined varsity clubs.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Therefore, 240 - 80 = <<240-80=160>>160 boys did not join varsity clubs.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
